nodes.text: Tregga was a human male Chak-root smuggler from Oslumpex V during the reign of the Galactic Empire. In 10 BBY, He was on the ice-covered planet Vandor, where he was present in the saloon known as the Lodge when the human outlaws Han Solo and Lando Calrissian first met over a game of sabacc.

Tregga first appeared in the 2018 Anthology film, Solo: A Star Wars Story and was first identified in the accompanying reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
